bio: Bruce Wayne, a wealthy playboy, dedicates his life to fighting crime as Batman after witnessing his parents' murder.
powers: Peak human conditioning, martial arts, detective skills, high-tech gadgets.
allies: Robin, Alfred Pennyworth, Commissioner Gordon, Justice League.

bio: Kal-El, last son of Krypton, becomes Earth's greatest hero, Superman, using his incredible powers for good.
powers: Super strength, flight, invulnerability, heat vision, x-ray vision.

characters: Jay Garrick, Barry Allen, Wally West, Bart Allen
bio: The Flash, fastest man alive, uses his speed to fight crime and protect Central City.
powers: Super speed, time travel, intangibility, superhuman reflexes.
allies: Kid Flash, Iris West, Justice League.

characters: Alan Scott, Hal Jordan, Guy Gardner, John Stewart, Kyle Rayner, Jade, Sinestro, Simon Baz
bio: Green Lanterns wield power rings to protect the universe, with Hal Jordan being one of the most notable.
powers: Power ring grants flight, energy constructs, force fields.

bio: Oliver Queen, a billionaire with expert archery skills, fights crime as Green Arrow.
powers: Archery, martial arts, peak human conditioning.

bio: Diana, an Amazonian princess, becomes Wonder Woman, champion of justice and equality.
powers: Super strength, flight, combat skills, magic weapons.

bio: J'onn J'onzz, last of the Martians, uses his powers to fight for justice on Earth.
Dick Grayson, former acrobat, becomes Robin and later Nightwing, protector of Bl√ºdhaven.
powers: Expert acrobat, martial artist, detective skills.

characters: Dan Garret, Ted Kord, Jaime Reyes
bio: Blue Beetle uses a powerful scarab to fight crime, with Jaime Reyes being the current bearer.
powers: Alien armor grants flight, energy blasts, enhanced strength.

bio: Black Canary uses her sonic scream and martial arts skills to fight crime.
powers: Canary Cry (sonic scream), expert martial artist.

bio: Peter Parker, a young photographer, gains spider-like abilities and becomes Spider-Man.
allies: Mary Jane Watson, Aunt May, Avengers.

bio: Steve Rogers, a super-soldier from World War II, fights for justice as Captain America.
powers: Enhanced strength, agility, expert tactician, unbreakable shield.

bio: Tony Stark, a billionaire inventor, creates an advanced suit of armor to become Iron Man.
powers: Powered armor suit grants flight, super strength, advanced weaponry.

bio: Thor, the Norse god of thunder, wields his hammer Mjolnir to protect both Asgard and Earth.
powers: Godly strength, control over thunder, flight with Mjolnir.

bio: Bruce Banner transforms into the Hulk, a green behemoth with immense strength, when angered.
